desc_content.paragraph: Settings for shading in the 3D viewport

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [0, 1], default (0.05, 0.05, 0.05)

list_item.paragraph: THEME Theme, Use the theme for background color.
WORLD World, Use the world for background color.
VIEWPORT Viewport, Use a custom color limited to this viewport only.

desc_content.paragraph: Way to draw the cavity shading

list_item.paragraph: WORLD World, Cavity shading computed in world space, useful for larger-scale occlusion.
SCREEN Screen, Curvature-based shading, useful for making fine details more visible.
BOTH Both, Use both effects simultaneously.
SINGLE Single, Show scene in a single color.
RANDOM Random, Show random object color.

desc_content.paragraph: Lighting Method for Solid/Texture Viewport Shading

list_item.paragraph: FLAT Flat, Display using flat lighting.
STUDIO Studio, Display using studio lighting.
MATCAP MatCap, Display using matcap material and lighting.

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [0, 1], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
float array of 3 items in [0, 1], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Show the studiolight in the background
Rotation of the studiolight around the Z-Axis
Method to display/shade objects in the 3D View

list_item.paragraph: WIREFRAME Wireframe, Display the object as wire edges.
SOLID Solid, Display in solid mode.
MATERIAL LookDev, Display in LookDev mode.

desc_content.paragraph: Render lights and light probes of the scene
Make the lighting fixed and not follow the camera

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
